services.name: Whisper
services.description: Transcribe any audio file to text. Returns the transcription of the audio file as a string.

services.name: Sentiment Analysis
services.summary: Analyze sentiment and emotions of a given text.
services.description:
Analyze sentiment of a given text. Returns a JSON object with the following fields:
- `language`: the language of the text
- `sentiment`: the sentiments detected in the text
- `top_words`: the top words in the text

services.name: Musical Genre Detection
services.summary: Detect the style of a music
services.description:
Detect the musical genre of a song. Returns a JSON object with the following fields:
- `genre_top': the top genre of the song
- `genres': a dictionary of the genres of the song with their probabilities

services.name: Art Generation
services.summary: Generate art images (album covers) from lyrics and sentiments
services.description:
Album Cover Art Generation is an image generation API that allows you to generate an art image (album cover)from lyrics and music style. Returns several images:
- `image1`: the first generated image (stabilityai/stable-diffusion-2-base)
- `image2`: the second generated image (prompthero/openjourney)
- `image3`: the third generated image (civitai)
